excerpt: "Most recently Fortinet added two high-speed, next generation firewalls designed to protect data center assets that feature support for the vendor's AI-Powered Security Services, which blend AI and machine-learning technologies to make customers aware of cyber threats and act on protecting resources much more quickly, Fortinet stated."
